topics.body: Does anyone else get extremely agitated when people hum? I don't even have a good reason for it but it bugs the hell out of me. And I feel like a prick when I ask people to stop
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
And in other news one of my friends is literally going to become a cyborg in a month.

Basically someone I know had muscle cancer and lost control of his right arm, but because he only recently lost control of his arm and it wasn't his spine but rather the nerves in his arm got severed by the cancer he's the perfect test subject for a neural electronic bridge.

Cause his brain still hasn't registered that his arm isn't movable anymore they're going to rush him into surgery to implant the new prototype computer chip in his body so that they can shove it in and the rehab will be drastically less.

Tl:dr;
Friend lost control of his arm -> they're using him as a test subject to shove a bunch of electronics in his body as soon as possible before his brain adapts to not having control of the arm -> he's literally becoming a cyborg.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
